headline: Medtronic : receives FDA 510(k) clearance for Visualase™ V2 MRI-Guided Laser Ablation System
summary: Medtronic, a global leader in medical technology, today announced it has received 510 clearance from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration for its Visualase™ V2 MRI-Guided Laser Ablation System....

headline: Emerging Markets Power Boston Scientific: Will the Growth Trend Continue?
summary: BSX posts solid Q1 sales growth in emerging markets, reinforcing their role in the company's long-term global strategy.
